rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area integrated with the kitchen. Vastu-aligned entrance on the east side to invite positive energy, ensuring natural light.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area. Designed with ergonomically placed counters and appliances for ease of use.
Dedicated home office located near the living area for minimal distraction, with Vastu principles ensuring productive energy flow.
Cozy library space for reading and study, with ample shelving and seating. Placed in a quiet corner as per Vastu to enhance concentration.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom designed for ease of access with grab bars and non-slip surfaces.
Master bedroom in the north-west corner for prosperity, with built-in closet and space for family members.
Additional bedroom to accommodate joint family members, placed on the south-east to ensure stability.
Third bedroom for children or guests, located to maintain energy flow and privacy.
Additional study space for joint family members, integrated with quiet areas.
Space designated for family meals, separate dining area adjacent to the living space.
Multi-purpose storage area for household items, designed to keep clutter minimal.
Entrance hall that transitions smoothly from the exterior to interior, aligned with Vastu principles.
Small balcony offering outdoor space, aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with ramp and tactile guidance.
Strategically placed windows for natural light and ventilation, ensuring energy flow.
